title: Grand Lagneux Roman Bath
description: At Grand Lagneux, a small village in the French commune of Yenne, a rescue excavation in 2020 revealed part of a Roman-era bathing establishment. The excavated site is now buried under a modern home. This find constitutes another possible locality in the commune for attested ancient name "Etanna".

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to photographs in Ferber 2023, which depict adjacent structures and roads. The excavated remains cannot be seen in the imagery; a modern house and yard cover the site.
properties.title: Imagery location of excavation
